message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit too high for me.  Would you be willing to come down to $80? That's my maximum budget.
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob. I can see you really want the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $100.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $100 is still a little more than I'm comfortable with.  How about we settle on $90?  I'm really hoping to get this deal done.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $95, which is the lowest I'm willing to go.
